This device does not support NFC

The Sun trail

The Sun trail of Křtiny is a model of our Solar system scaled to 1:1 milliard. All models of planets and the Sun and the distances you have to walk on the trail are also scaled as written above.

At each station you will find a sphere representing the given planet. You can read the information about the planet on the nearby board.

Our Sun trail was inspired by . Planetary trail build by the observatory in Hradec Králové, but it is not just a plain copy. The realization of this trail was originally supposed to be self aided. But thanks to the support of ŠLP Křtiny and the South moravian district it was possible to build a more elaborate version of this trail. The main part was being built in the year 2014 and opened int the year 2015.

If you follow this trail you will be able to try on your own how close or far away the planets in our Solar system are. At the same time you will experience the nice landscape of Křtiny.

The path

The Sun trail can be walked through from both ends. You can start at the Sun in Křtiny and finish at the Neptune near ŠLP Křtiny arboretum. Then you can continue and follow the yellow marking towards Jedovnice or get on the IDS JMK number 201 (Křtiny, Hájovna na lukách) bus.
Other than that you can approach the Sun from the other end of the trail and begin at Neptune.

The trail follows well marked path mostly inside a forrest and has a length of about 4.5 km. For better orientation you can use the provided map. If you are going to return to Křtiny on foot double the distance. You will only need casual footwear for this trail.

You can also take a shorter variant of the trail which ends at Saturn. After that you will return from Viligrunt. (Saturn is about 1.5km from the beginning of the trail).

Translations of the information boards into English and German can be found in this app.
You can also play a game during which you will use your phone or tablet.

The Solar system

The following picture shows a scheme of the orbits of planets and other astronomical objects in our Solar system. These are those you will encounter on the Sun trail. The inner part of the Solar system is enlarged 10 times for clarity.
The gauge is in astronomical units.
(1 AU = 149 597 870,691 km)
The guidelines mark the positions of planets, (1) Ceres and comet 1P/Halley on September 1st 2003.

News and contact

If you liked the trail, please drop us a line at kontakt@slunecnistezka.cz. And read what others have said.

If you want to know about any news, like us on Facebook or Twitter.
If you have any ideas or questions, please contact us at the e-mail address mentioned above.
A lot of people already helped us, we will be happy to hear from you!

The Sun trail is a community project and is run under the management of Křtiny.
More at The Sun trail

Please also have a look at photos from building the trail.

Authors of photos

Sun: NASA/Goddard/SDO
Mercury: NASA/Messenger
Venus: NASA/JPL/Magellan
Earth: NASA/Goddard
Moon: Fred Locklear
Mars: NASA/Hubble
Ceres: NASA/JPL-Caltech
Jupiter: NASA/JPL/Voyager 1
Halley: Giotto Project, ESA
Saturn: NASA/ESA/JPL/Cassini
Uranus: NASA/JPL/Voyager 2/Joe Ruhinski
Neptune: NASA/JPL/Voyager 2

You can start the game by scanning an NFC tag or a QR code off a board on the Sun trail with a scanner from this app. The game can be started at any board except the first general information board.

In the game mode you can buy and sell items at each stop along the trail. You earn credits for trading these goods.
Before you finish the game at the last stop, try to earn as much as you can.

In the beginning you will be given a basic space ship. A trustworthy Ikarus M and a small amount of space credits Which are used as money.

At each stop you must scan the code of the planet. Then you can enter the shop and trade items.

Certain items can be sold only on certain planets. Other items can be sold everywhere. You can read info about each item by tapping the red question mark either in the shop or in your inventory.

During the game you will have a chance to buy better, larger space ships. Those will allow you to transport larger amount of goods.

Based on how much credits you earn at the end of the game, you will be rewarded with a space fleet officer rank.

Have fun.

The belt between Mars and Jupiter contains a lot of objects which are smaller than asteroids. The first discovered one and also the largest of them all - 1000 km in size is Ceres. Next discovered objects were Pallas, Juno and Vesta. Non of them is observable by the bare eyes only. There is about 100 000 astronomical objects larger than 1 km. Their combined mass though is less than the mass of Mercury. Most of these objects have not had gone through the phase of remelting in the past. The temperature and pressure inside these small objects was not high enough. They therefore most probably consist of the type of rock from which larger planets formed.

The mythological origin of the name: Ceres was an Italian goddess of corn, grain, growth and agriculture.

Because of the existence of liquid water on Earth, it is the only planet known to support life. The Earth was formed about 4,56 milliard years ago, together with the Sun and other objects of the Solar system. It is almost the same planet as Mercury, Venus or Mars. It has an iron core and a thick rocky layer. The Earth is not exactly round – it is slightly flattened (the polar diameter is 12 714 km). The Earth orbits the Sun and rotates around it’s own axis. But it also makes other movements. The most significant is axial precession, which is the change in orientation of the Earth’s rotational axis, which happens every 26 500 years. Currently, the Earth’s axis points towards the star Polaris. The Solar system consists of eight orbiting planets but there are more than one thousand extrasolar planets, which orbit other stars.

The mythological origin of the name: The Greek name is Gaia, she was the mother of people and the gods.

Orbits of comets are usually elongated, elliptical and more inclined to the plane of ecliptic than the orbits of planets. When the comet approaches the Sun to the distance of Mars it heats up enough that the ice starts to sublime and a cloud of dust and gasses forms the cometary coma the nebulous envelope around the nucleus of a comet. Interactions with the Solar wind then creates the tail. You can only see the nucleus of the comet at this stop. While the nucleus is usually small - kilometers or tens of kilometers, the coma can be as large as thousands or even millions of kilometers. The tail can be more than 150 million km long (the distance between the Sun and the Earth). That would be hundreds of meters on our trail.

The mythological origin of the name: comets are usually named by their discoverers. Although Edmund Halley (1656–1742) did not discover the comet, he was the first to predict the comet`s return.

Despite the fact that Jupiter weights less than 1/1000 of mass of the Sun, it is still the largest planet of the Solar system. Compared to the four inner planets, Jupiter and other outer planets have a relatively small rocky core, bulky hydrogen or icy layer, and a large and gradually thinning atmosphere. Consequently, we do not observe sharply defined surface boundaries for these outer planets. In 1610, Galileo Galilei discovered with his telescope four big moons of Jupiter: Io, Europa, Ganymede and Callisto. To show these moons in our model of Solar system, they would need to be around 3 mm in diameter and would orbit Jupiter in distances ranging from 42 to 189 cm.

The mythological origin of the name: Greek name is Zeus. He was the son of Titan Cronus and his wife Rhea. His grandfather was Uranus and grandmother was Gaia. Zeus was the Father of gods and men.

If you look at Mars you will immediately notice the distinctive red color. This is caused by iron oxides. White polar caps are made of ice CO2 and H2O. In the present liquid water can not exist on Mars because the atmosphere is too thin (atmospheric pressure on Mars is 100 times lower than on Earth). Mars has two small moons of irregular shapes: Phobos (27 km x 21 km x 19 km) and Deimos. They are probably astronomical object caught by Marse`s gravity.

The mythological origin of the name: Mars was a Roman analogy to the Greek god of war Ares, the son of the highest gods Jupiter and Juno. Phobos and Deimos were a personification of Fear and Terror. They were Arese`s companions and appeared next to him in battles.

Next stop

Planets, differently from the stars, do not shine by themselves but only reflect light from the Sun. Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun. Astronomers previously tried to discover a hypothetical planet Vulcan that would orbit even closer but were not successful. Even though Mercury is small (about the size of our Moon), it has a massive iron core.

The mythological origin of the name: Greek name is Hermes, who was Jupiter`s illegitimate son and Apollo’s (god of the Sun) brother. Mercury was a god with split personality: on one side, he was the god of wisdom but on the other, he was a deceitful thief.

The Moon orbits around the Earth as a natural satellite. Compared to the Earth, the Moon is four times smaller. Since it`s orbital period around Earth is the same as it`s sidereal rotation period, only one hemisphere of the Moon is always facing the Earth. This phenomenon is called rare rotation and it is caused by Earth`s tidal forces which slowed down original faster Moon`s rotation in the past. According to nowadays knowledge the Moon formed after the "proto-Earth" was hit by an astronomical object about the size of Mars. A large number of debris from the collision then either fell back onto Earth or formed a ring which later through collisions and gravity created the Moon.

The mythological origin of the name: the Moon is called "Luna" in poetry. This name comes from Latin. The Roman goddess who had this name was an analogy to the Greek Selene. Later also Artemis became the goddess of the Moon. Hekate was the goddess of the Moon in it`s invisible phase.

The Neptune is a planet which was first discovered by a mathematical calculation. Only after that it was observed on the sky. J. C. Adams and independently U. J. J. Leverrier calculated Neptune`s orbit in the 1845 from Uranus orbit deviations. J. G. Galle found Neptune 1° beyond the predicted location. To see Neptune we definitely need a telescope. Until recently only two of Neptune`s moons were known: large Triton with a circular orbit and s small Nereid which has an elongated elliptical orbit (Nereid can get as far away as 110 diameters of Neptune).

The mythological origin of the name: the Neptune was an Italian god of water. He was later equated with Poseidon and became the ruler of the sea. With his trident he could upset the sea and shake the earth.

Neptune is the last stop of the Sun trail of Křtiny. The beginning of the Sun trail is located near Křtiny elementary school.

Saturn is a giant gaseous planet with an average density lower than that of water. The most noticeable are the Saturn`s rings. They were first described only in 1655 by Christian Huygens. The rings consist of tiny particles (the size varies from 1cm to 100 m). These particles orbit Saturn in essentially a single plane. Saturn has numerous moons. The most mysterious is Titan with its methane atmosphere (the moon with 3000 km diameter has too low gravitation to permanently keep its gaseous atmosphere).

The mythological origin of the name: the Greek name is Kronos, who was the son of Uranus and Gaia. Saturn was the god of agriculture.

The Sun is a star. Compared to the other planets, it is a massive ball full of gas. The core temperature is about 15 million °C, the pressure is 2,48·10^16 Pa (the standard pressure on Earth is 101 325 Pa) and density is 162 000 kg/m3. Under these conditions, the nuclei of hydrogen atoms fuse to form helium atoms and generate photons and neutrinos. Photon luminosity of the Sun is 3,85 · 10^26 W. Energy of about 342W per 1 m2 lands on Earth and this energy enables the existence of life on our planet. The Sun is between 4.6 to 4.7 billion years old and it will continue to shine for another 5 billion years. At the end of its life, the Sun will go through the state of a red giant. At the speed of about 1 000km/s, the atmosphere of this red giant will separate to expose the Sun`s core. This event will be observable as a cooling white dwarf and its expanding cover will create planetary nebula.

The mythological origin of the name: people were always aware of the Sun’s existence. Many of their gods were linked to the Sun. In the ancient Egypt, god of the Sun was called Ra. For Greeks, the god of the Sun was Apollo.

Next stop

Uranus was discovered only with the use of telescopes due to its small size, which is at the limits of visibility by naked eye. Rings of the Uranus are extremely dark (they reflect only about 4% of the sunshine) and were located indirectly in 1977, when the planet overlaid a star. The unique feature of Uranus is the greatly tilted axis of rotation - it lies close to its plane of revolution about the Sun and, as a consequence, we observe alternating north or south poles of the planet.

The mythological origin of the name: Uranus; together with Gaia, was the oldest god on Earth. He arose out of night. The names of Uranus`s moons are interesting, because they do not come from the Greek mythology but from the theater plays of William Shakespeare (e.g. Titania, Oberon, Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel).

The Venus is always shrouded into dense clouds. Therefore direct sunlight can not be seen from the surface. High surface temperature (Even higher than on Mercury) is caused by the greenhouse effect - visible sunlight passes through the atmosphere, heats up the surface which then radiates in infrared radiation. This radiation is effectively absorbed by the atmosphere heating it up. Similar process is happening in Earth`s atmosphere but it is less effective. The planet Venus revolves around it`s axis very slowly and to the opposite direction than the direction Venus orbits around the Sun.

The mythological origin of the name: the Venus was a Roman analogy to the Greek goddess of love, beauty and fertility - Aphrodite. She was born from the sea foam which came to existence from the penis of castrated Uranus.

Next stop

For your great work, the Milky way headquarters awards you with:

Welcome to the sector C-137. You are beginning a new game here.

Congratulations young pilot, you were given your first space ship.

This ship was given to you by the Trade Federation. You are also receiving some credits.
Your new mission is to transport goods and trade it on the planets and other astronomical object in our Solar system.

Good luck.

Icarus is a size S spaceship.
It is a small but fast ship. It was given to you by the Trade federation.
Maneuvering thrusters probably need some tweaking.

Icarus is equipped with a sophisticated cooling mechanism which enables it to fly close to the Sun. Therefore it is suitable for transporting Sun products. Other ships will be able to fly to the Sun once graviton shield technology is put to use.

Lokys is an M size spaceship, therefore it has larger cargo bay than S size ships.

JLokys is propelled by a plasma drive. The hull can be polarized and the front part of the ship contains a set of super conductive electromagnets. These repel charged dust particles when the ship is flying at high speeds. At maximum speed even objects as small as dust could damage the ship. The engine room contains a fusion generator which can be ejected from the ship in case of a critical failure.

Daedalus is an L size spaceship, therefore it has larger cargo bay than M size ships.

Daedalus is one of the largest ships currently available on the market. It is the flagship of the Trade federation. It boasts a completely new recently developed microwave engine which enables the Daedalus to fly longer distances than any other ship. Microwave engines do not use solid, liquid or gaseous fuel, they run solely on electricity.
This item can be sold at:

Ion thrusters use xenon gas. The early models of ion drives used to ionize the gas inside the engine by themselves and then expelled the charged particles out the thruster with very high voltage. Nowadays the technology has advanced, the ions are prepared in advance and are transported in plastic magnetic bottles. The thrusters are then filled with these ready-made ions. A probe called Dawn with an old ion propulsion was used to discover the planet Ceres in the year 2007.

20 years passed from the day the graviton particle was discovered. Gravitons are responsible for gravity. These particles have no electric charge. Graviton generators are complicated devices, the graviton shield generator you are transporting is one of the first prototypes. It is believed that these shields will be used to protect space ships once the research is complete. Currently hull polarization and magnetic field is used as a protection.

This metal is obtained by mining Iron meteorites. It is a relatively valuable substance with high nickel content. Exploratory space ships equipped with a mineral scanner revealed that only about 18% of meteorites are iron meteorites. Other ones belong to the category of Chondrites. They are stony and are only used to build boundary stones. The Sky iron is used to manufacture jewelry, armor or it is further processed to obtain pure Fe (iron) and Ni (Nickel).

Cubesats are small devices weighting about 10 kg. They look like cubes covered in solar panels. They are equipped with various sensors, cameras and transmitters. Currently they are being used to build a communication network between Earth and Neptune. One cubesat is released every 100 km. Thanks to miniature thrusters developed by NASA, the satellite is capable of holding it\'s position. The satellites pass messages and function as a sort of space internet.

Cubes of frozen methane are obtained from comets. Since comet catching is still a difficult operation, this raw material is rather rare. Very pure methane can be harvested by dissolving methane ice. Methane is a significant industrial material. In a certain part of our Solar system, methane ice cubes are used as an ingredient for fire cocktails.

Solar energy is still very important in space. While we are able to produce electric energy in a number of different ways, still solar energy does not require any sort of additional fuel, it is pure and natural. By placing solar power plants near the Sun we can generate petawatts of energy which is then stored inside energy crystals. These are transported to the more dark parts of the Solar system by a fleet of carrier ships.

This technology uses the annihilation of protons and antiprotons. When they react, charged particles called pions are made. These pions are then accelerated through an electromagnetic thruster. The pion bean can be used as a propulsion for a space craft, a weapon or as an energy based drill. This laser is for example used to mine materials from extremely tough meteorites.

This device operates with a yet to be understood zero point energy of a quantum mechanical system. In particular scientists suppose that this specimen contains a chamber filled with quantum vacuum. ZPM as this device was named was found on Earth near the South pole. This technology is extraterrestrial! As far as we know only two ZPM modules exist in our Solar system. The device is probably some sort of electric energy generator. Your mission is to transport it elsewhere for further examination.

Spaceships do not usually have much free space on-board. Pilots therefore can not have a kitchen full of various ingredients to make different foods. For this reason the protein muffin was created. It is made of proteins combined with synthetic amino-acids, vitamins and minerals - everything the body needs. Do not be fooled by the nice looks, they taste exactly how it is described above.

Guinea pigs or even kittens do not amaze anybody nowadays. Today`s internet is filled by space animals. The animal you are transporting came to our Solar system from Proxima Centauri. It became very popular because it changes color based on it`s mood. They are also sold under the name Indicator. There is a manual which you can get that explains their feelings by their color. A mobile app also appeared which translates the color of your pet to it`s mood from a photograph.

Torn solar sails can slow down any solar sailing vessel. This is one of the reasons repair bots were made for. But they also take care of space stations and satellites. They can automatically recognize various defects and repair the damage. They carry a set of useful tools with them at all times to repair almost anything. The last repair bot prototype consists of small blocks which can build any shape necessary. Currently the manufacturer is trying to solve a minor problem of them self replicating.

Not only protein muffins are great for long space journeys. Jupiter mining company makes this heavy-duty food which is available in vacuum bags, cans and even glass bottles. It consists of 40% space moth paste, their nutritional value is very high and they are easy to breed. The company supplies a space moth cookie blueprint for a food printer with the food. You can print the cookie and eat the paste with it.

The Trade federation invented this device. Now they equip even space ships with a larger model of the holographic phone. The hologram is made with a patented method of freezing light with laser induced sodium atom cooling to temperatures nearing the absolute zero. In such environment light can be slowed down to draw three dimensional holograms.

Next in the row of space sweets is the P-oreo cookie. The manufactures in fact only sells a blueprint for a food printer, a list of recommended ingredient combinations and ingredient containers. Your job is to print the cookies. The technology of food printing was established by NASA 15 years ago. In the near future food printers will be replaced with molecular food materializers which are being developed by the Starfleet academy.

In the year 2011 a camera which can record a trillion frames per second was invented. This device was later improved and nowadays is available for an ordinary customer. The camera is capable of recording the flight of individual photons. It is mainly used for art but was also used to make a whole movie.

Space tourism is very popular, though on foreign planets you can not just drink any water from a spring. Well, you can if you do not mind catching some "friendly" parasite. This filter boasts 95% efficiency at removing water pollutants and bacteria including the Ripley`s mold from any water.

If you are going to watch the last surviving individuals of ursus maritimus or you are going to the surface of the frozen Uranus, you will need a warm thermal isolation. The research of polar bear fur along with advanced nanotechnology gave us this thermal foil. Under it you will not lose any body heat. It is also great for food storage.

The Pulsed microwave stun gun is a defensive weapon developed after the Black Mesa incident. Using a series of five microwave impulses it creates a ionized conductive channel up to a distance of 34 m. Then the weapon sends a high voltage 25 000 up to 200 000 volts pulse through the channel. Since electricity always flows through the path of least resistance, the impulse goes through the channel and hits the target.

Planets or stations which can not grow plants in ordinary soil have to use hydroponics - growing plants without soil inside a special nutrient solution. Moreover the plants grow faster and are less prone to diseases. The cylinder contains a filtering mechanism and a manure dispenser system which monitors the growth automatically. Hydroponic cylinders are also used as air purifiers because they produce pure oxygen.

The company Combine came to the market with this device in the year 2089. This phone uses quantum entangled particles. Communication with these devices is very secure and in principle possible at any distance. You can call from Earth to Mars in real time. The same company is also working on a teleport device. If they succeed it would almost completely replace space flights.

This spacesuit accessory was designed by the world known engineer Chell. These shoes have a technology that enables the user to sustain falls from very high altitudes. They are used mainly on exploratory missions. They also have an inbuilt magnetic sole which can be used to walk on metal spaceship hulls. The surface of the shoes is coated with a nanomaterial in order to avoid pollutant contamination.

This rope made of Unobtaininum is fascinating!. It`s structure becomes the more tough the more tension is applied. This material is very rare and hard to obtain. The name Unobtainium is a label for something that is extremely rare, or physically impossible. The physical limits of this material are currently unknown. Theoretically it may be infinitely strong!

This electromagnetic bottle contains 5 grams of antimatter in the form of antiprotons. This is enough to blow up an entire planet. Antimatter is obtained in gigantic particle accelerators built on asteroids. It is used as a fuel for engines, generators and antimatter lasers. The first antimatter was created on Earth in CERN accelerator. The container comes with a warning: In case of damage, eject the container from the ship and fly to a safe distance of 5 million km.

Each of these 42 modules has it`s own quantum processor and contains an universal bus. By connecting a large number of these modules into a big computer an extremely powerful quantum machine can be created. A smaller version of such computer helped to solve the problem of large number factorization years ago. It was able to solve it within minutes and therefore crack some ciphers used at that time. The new quantum computer will have a task to verify whether P = NP.

This Felinists (reference to a Czech fairytale) invention allows the transport of light in paper boxes coated with shiny varnish. The Felinists noticed that light does not pass through the wall of a box. From the E = m*c^2 equation we can see that photos have a mass and therefore must not be able to fly through the wall. If we close the lid in the right moment the photons simply must stay inside. Boxes of photons are used mainly in the dark mines on Neptune.

Space moths are able to survive in the cold vacuum of the space for an extended time period. They are usually found on space stations where they feed on remains or other insects in large warehouses. They can walk on the outer side of the station hull and get inside through waste pipes. The Jupiter mining company owns space moth farms and make protein rich food of them.

This type of propulsion uses hydrogen, helium or carbon dioxide. The gas is ionized using electromagnetic radiation in microwave spectrum into a state of very hot plasma. This plasma has a temperature of several million degrees Celsius. In the last stage of the engine plasma is electromagnetically directed to flow out the thruster. These engines have higher specific impulse than ion drives. The firs functional plasma drive was used to fly to Mars in the year 2035.

Plasma H is an ionized gas obtained from the Sun. Hydrogen (H) is the most abundant element on the Sun. Plasma H is caught from eruptions using high energy magnetic collectors. The product labeled Plasma H is a very pure hydrogen plasma with minimal contamination of other heavier elements. It is being transported inside magnetic containers which utilize the technology of helmholtz coils. It is mainly used in EPS system of Federation ships.

The star dust flies freely through the universe. Almost all colonies on other planets use the star dust as a spice. It consists of miniature pieces of comets, asteroids and other astronomical objects. The dust has a weak stony taste. Nevertheless gourmets consider it the best thing the universe can offer. It comes in various qualities while purely comet based star dust is believed to be the worst but easiest to obtain.

Years of influence of the Martian soil changed the color of potatoes to turquoise. Though they still taste as good as the good old yellow potatoes from Earth. But they are more rich in magnesium, potassium, sodium and sulfur and chlorine must be extracted from them before use. These elements are the most common on Mars. Martian potatoes are mostly used as a side dish for space moth paste.

They come from the planet Xen where they are mined in surface mines. They are made of Fullerene C104 which also contains a molecule of Rhenium inside. Because of that they extremely easily absorb energy. They are used to transport electric energy from solar power plants. Accumulators are also made of them. Crystals exposed to cosmic radiation on the surface of Xen usually glow, since they have been charged by the radiation to at least 70% of their capacity.

Ceresian tea is made of a special lichen which grows deep under the surface of Ceres. The lichen is frozen to near the absolute zero -273.14°C and then crushed to dust. It is then mixed with star dust and mint. It is considered the best if it is prepared in the heat of the Sun. The station near Venus hosts a well known tearoom where they make the best Ceresian tea.

A device called diamond pickaxe is capable of extracting soil in a form of compact cubes, which are easy to transport. Planets with inhospitable conditions have to import soil from other planets. Once it is confirmed that foreign soil will not damage the ecosystem, it is possible to build a field of soil cubes and grow local food. This technique for example can not be used on Mars.
